meanings.definition: The quality of being clear or obvious.
meanings.sent1: The apparentness of the sign made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The apparentness of the mistake was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The apparentness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The apparentness of the solution dawned on her like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The apparentness of the danger sent shivers down his spine.

meanings.definition: The state of being visible or easily perceived.
meanings.sent1: The apparentness of the mountain in the distance was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The apparentness of the stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The apparentness of the cat hiding behind the curtain made us all chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The apparentness of the truth hit him like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The apparentness of the rainbow after the storm brought hope to all.
